alert.note: Alert for Bolivar; Carroll; Grenada; Holmes; Leflore; Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 2:31AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Sunflower, northwestern Holmes, northwestern Carroll, Grenada, Leflore and southeastern Bolivar Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 230 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Webb to near Ruleville to Shaw. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Doddsville around 235 AM CDT. Minter City around 245 AM CDT. Sunflower, Schlater, Sunnyside and Blaine around 250 AM CDT. Moorhead and Money around 300 AM CDT. Holcomb and Avalon around 305 AM CDT. Greenwood, Itta Bena and Bew Springs around 310 AM CDT. Grenada and Morgan City around 315 AM CDT. Malmaison around 320 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees. If on or near Grenada Lake, get off the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Boats could be damaged or overturned in high winds and suddenly higher waves.

area.areaDesc: Bolivar; Carroll; Grenada; Holmes; Leflore; Sunflower
